bibl.title: Psalms 149-150: A Bilingual Greek and Old Nubian Version from Qasr Ibrim.
bibl.note: T. Lond. Inv. EA 71892 (1990 1-27 75): QI.64.2, QI.64/81. Wooden plank found in the south (also called the east) crypt of church 1 in Qasr Ibrim. Transcription of the obverse, eleventh-fourteenth cent.
RUFFINI Giovanni, Psalms 149-150: A Bilingual Greek and Old Nubian Version from Qasr Ibrim.
